attributes.action: Petition to test and properly protect NHS frontline staff from Covid-19
attributes.background: To test every single NHS worker fighting to save lives from Covid-19; to immediately ensure all NHS staff are supplied with the proper protection equipment so that they can safely carry out this vital work;

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304243

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
